      • processToken

        @PutMapping(value="/branch/{branchId}/tokens/{tokenId}/process")
public void processToken(@PathVariable(value="branchId")
                                                                                          java.lang.Integer branchId,
                                                                                          @PathVariable(value="tokenId")
                                                                                          java.lang.Integer tokenId,
                                                                                          @Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                          @Valid TokenProcessParameters tokenProcessParameters)
        Processes the token by taking the service or step of service for which counter is assigned and adding action/comments for the selected step. It also takes care of re-assigning the token to another counter if the token requires some other service or step of service to be processed.
        Parameters:
        branchId - branch identifier
        tokenId - token identifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the service or step of service is not served by the counter on which token is assigned or if there is multiple steps are created for a single counter service. Or the if service processing type value passed is not SINGLE_COUNTER or MULTI_COUNTER.

      • assignCounter

        @PutMapping(value="/branch/{branchId}/tokens/{tokenId}/assign")
public void assignCounter(@PathVariable(value="branchId")
                                                                                          java.lang.Integer branchId,
                                                                                          @PathVariable(value="tokenId")
                                                                                          java.lang.Integer tokenId)
        Assigns a token to counter based on the highest order service selected in counter. It checks for the counter serving the highest order pending service and then assigns the token to counter which has the minimum number of tokens to be served.
        Parameters:
        branchId - branch identifier
        tokenId - token identifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are no services pending in the token to be served
